ui.medical

Class DoctorMedicalRecordUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • ui.medical.DoctorMedicalRecordUI

  • public class DoctorMedicalRecordUI
extends java.lang.Object
    public class DoctorMedicalrecordUI display the medical record of specific patient : shows all treatment of the patient which dine in GHealth clinics shows information about the patient option to add treatment option to add visit option to add Examinations referral option to send request information from HMO about the patient option to view patient information from HMO
    Author:
    maisam marjieh
